articles.title: Team USA writes a new chapter and other takeaways from gold-medal triumph over Canada
articles.description:
“We did it. We’re a part of that history. No one could ever take it away from us."

The post Team USA writes a new chapter and other takeaways from gold-medal triumph over Canada appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Team USA secured gold in hockey, defeating Canada on February 22, 2026.
Boston's Charlie McAvoy played a pivotal role in the victory.
The win boosts local pride and inspires youth hockey programs in Boston.

articles.title: Jack Hughes lost teeth from a high-stick to the mouth before his Olympic gold-winning goal
articles.description:
"More people are going to be looking at his medal than his teeth."

The post Jack Hughes lost teeth from a high-stick to the mouth before his Olympic gold-winning goal appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jack Hughes scored the Olympic gold-winning goal for Team USA on February 22, 2026.
Hughes lost several teeth due to a high-stick incident during the match.
His victory boosts local pride and interest in Boston's hockey community.
